job.title: Data Scientist-REMOTE
job.description:
This Jobot Job is hosted by Taylor Buckelew
Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button and sending us your resume.
Salary $135,000 - $170,000 per year
Located in the beautiful Palo Alto, CA we are the leading provider of AI- powered software products that transform healthcare claims and payment operations. Our platform has enabled us to develop and deploy, at high speed, industry-specific products.
We are looking to hire a strong Data Scientist, that will come in, develop and deploy scalable machine learning solutions to solve problems in the healthcare space.
We offer a comprehensive compensation package including but not limited to
You will be responsible for and MUST have most or ALL of the following
IF INTERESTED, APPLY DIRECTLY HERE OR EMAIL ME A RESUME AT taylor.buckelew@jobot.com
Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button.
